nodes.text: Xesh Squad was a unit in the Special Forces Division of the Republic Military during the Cold War with the Sith Empire. The squad succeeded in bombing the Imperial Citadel itself during the Cold War, and when Galactic War broke out with the Empire around 3642 BBY, Xesh Squad was assigned to infiltrate an Imperial base on the planet Hoth. However, they were killed after their successful infiltration when Imperial forces tracked them to an abandoned Ortolan outpost on the Clabburn Tundra.
